options.explain:
[Raging Lightning Cloud]
Attacks summon a Raging Lightning Cloud that attacks up to 4 enemies and applies effects, depending on the number of equipped Thunder equipment (2/3/5).
- Raging Lightning Cloud Summon Cooldown: 7.5 sec./5 sec./3 sec.
- Inflicts 1,500%of total Atk. Increase, Neutralize Gauge -5

active.explain:
Borrows the power of the fox orbs and strengthens you instantly.
 Activates [Ethereal Orb].
- Orb Gauge +5 when attacking (Cooldown: 1 sec.)
- Max Orb Charges: 1
- Orbs can't be charged during the Ethereal Orb buff.
- Orb Gauge +100 upon entering dungeons

[Ethereal Orb] [Equipment-Activated Option]
- When activated, fully consumes the Orb Gauge and casts a buff.
- Overall Damage +10% per orb consumed
- Buff Duration: 30 sec.
- Cooldown: 30 sec.Casts the Ethereal Orb buff. Consumes all orbs with a full gauge when used. (Cooldown: 30 sec.)
